name: FormGlut – Contact Form Plugin, Newsletter Form, Application Form, Payment, Multi Step & Custom Drag & Drop WP Form Builder
author: AppGlut

sections.description:
Easy Form Creation with FormGlut Builder

FormGlut is the ultimate user-friendly, highly customizable drag-and-drop form builder that offers you the ultimate features. It is a perfect form builder for beginners, new comers and advanced users. Create your functional forms for your website within minutes.

== Explore Extraordinary Features in the Free Version ==

  • Approximately 30+ ready-to-use input fields
  • Multi-column Contact Form Layout
  • Email notification
  • Smart Conditional Logic Form Fields
  • Reusability with pre-built templates
  • Top-notch Security with reCAPTCHA (v2 & v3), hCaptcha, or even with turnstile integration.
  • Responsive and Mobile-friendly
  • Placeholder Customization:
  • AJAX Submission and Validation
  • Beautiful Email Notifications
  • Role-based Form Restrictions
  • Time-limited Form Display
  • Extensive Form Field Options
  • In-depth Analytics
  • Default Values and URL Parameters
  • Easy Export/Import
  • Data Export Options
  • Effortlessly migrate from other form builder plugins with our one-click migrator.

Features available in the Pro Version

  • Explore 50+ input fields
  • Enable Advanced Post/CPT Creation
  • Implement Multi-step Forms
  • Integrate with 50+ Third-party Platforms (and more via Zapier)
  • Receive SMS Notifications
  • Access Geo-location Provider
  • Customize with Advanced Form Styler
  • Route Emails Conditionally
  • Conduct Numeric Calculations
  • Automate Data Deletion after Submission
  • Utilize Inventory Module
  • Seamlessly Import Form Entries
  • Integrate Quiz & Survey Module
  • Enhance with Advanced Form Validation
  • Create Landing Pages
  • Personalize Conditional Confirmation Messages
  • Enable Double Opt-in
  • Facilitate User Registration

Input Fields

Available Free Version Input Fields:

  • Email Address
  • Custom HTML
  • Country List
  • GDPR Agreement Field
  • Check Box
  • Image Upload
  • Numeric Field
  • Section Break
  • Shortcode
  • Text Input
  • Time & Date
  • Website URL
  • One Column Container
  • Two Column Container
  • Three Column Container
  • Four Column Container
  • Five Column Container
  • Six Column Container
  • Dropdown
  • Hidden Field
  • Mask Input
  • Multiple Choice
  • Name Fields
  • Password Field
  • Radio Button
  • reCAPTCHA
  • Turnstile
  • hCaptcha
  • Terms and Conditions
  • Text Area

Available FormGlut Pro Input Fields:

  • Action Hook
  • Chained Select
  • Checkable Grid
  • Color Picker
  • Coupon
  • Custom Payment Amount
  • File Upload
  • Form Step
  • Google Maps & Address autocomplete
  • Item Quantity
  • Net Promoter Score
  • Payment Item
  • Payment Method
  • Payment Summary
  • Phone/Mobile
  • Post Creation Fields
  • Post/CPT selection
  • Post Update
  • Quiz Module
  • Ratings
  • Range Slider
  • Repeat Field
  • Save & Resume
  • Signature
  • Subscription Field
  • Custom Submit Button

Conversational Forms

Experience enhanced form completion rates with FormGlut innovative conversational feature. Unlike traditional forms, users are presented with one question at a time, minimizing distractions and fostering higher completion rates. With multiple layout options tailored to your needs, you can create an engaging and intuitive form experience. Additionally, FormGlut offers versatile sharing options for conversational forms, including direct URLs, shortcodes, HTML embedding, and more, ensuring seamless integration into your workflow. Revolutionize your form-building experience with FormGlut Conversational Forms feature today.

Get Real Time Email Notification

Get notified every time someone fills up a form with entry details. With FormGlut, you can also inform your team members every time someone fills up a form and also send back a confirmation email to the new subscriber. FormGlut also enables you to automatically send out certain submissions from the email notification process if they fail to comply with specific conditions set by the admin.

Advanced Form Styler

In FormGlut Pro, using advanced form styler, you can easily highly customize your contact form. By maintaining brand consistency, you can attract visitors with amazing form design and boosting form conversion.

There are four pre-defined templates that you can select. If you choose a custom design then the styler will show the style elements based on your form’s available styles and you can design the form elements from the style controls.

Create PDF Files from Form Submission
You can generate PDF from your submitted data and send the PDF via email or let users download the PDF file. Generating invoices, creating reports, or providing order summaries made easy with this feature. This addon is completely free with FormGlut PDF add-on

Use FormGlut SMTP add-on
– Instant Email Delivery
– Route Emails to Many Connections
– Connect with Any Email Service
– Detailed Email Logging & Resending
– Fallback Email Connection
– Quick Resend Option
– Detailed Reporting
– Lightning-Fast UI with VueJS

Extensive Pro Integrations for Enhanced Functionality

Expand the capabilities of your forms with FormGlut’s wide range of powerful integrations:

  • Zapier: Connect your FormGlut data with thousands of online software through Zapier.
  • WebHook: Broadcast your WP Forms submissions to any web API endpoint with FormGlut’s powerful webhook module.
  • Google Sheets: Directly push your form entries to Google Sheets for easy data management.
  • ActiveCampaign: Create ActiveCampaign list signup forms in WordPress to grow your email list effortlessly.
  • Campaign Monitor: Generate Campaign Monitor newsletter signup forms directly within WordPress.
  • Constant Contact: Connect Constant Contact with your WP Forms to create subscription forms and grow your email list.
  • ConvertKit: Seamlessly integrate ConvertKit with your WP Forms for efficient email list management.
  • GetResponse: Create GetResponse newsletter signup forms in WordPress to expand your email list.
  • HubSpot: Subscribe a contact in HubSpot when a form is submitted on your WordPress site.
  • iContact: Connect iContact with your WP Forms to subscribe contacts upon form submission.
  • MooSend: Subscribe contacts in MooSend directly from your WP Forms submissions.
  • SendFox: Connect SendFox with WP Forms to subscribe contacts upon form submission.
  • MailerLite: Add subscribers easily by connecting your WP Forms with MailerLite.
  • SMS Notification: Receive SMS notifications instantly upon new form submissions using Twilio.
  • Platform.ly: Seamlessly integrate your WordPress forms with Platform.ly for streamlined marketing automation.
  • Trello: Create Trello Cards directly from form submissions to streamline task management.
  • Drip: Create Drip subscribers from WordPress using FormGlut’s Drip Module.
  • Sendinblue: Connect your contact forms with Sendinblue CRM for comprehensive email marketing.
  • Automizy: Integrate your contact forms with Automizy Marketing Solution for efficient marketing automation.
  • User Registration: Automatically create WordPress users from FormGlut form submissions.
  • Post/CPT Integration: Create various types of posts directly from form submissions and visually map ACF fields.
  • Payment Gateways: Accept payments, donations, and online orders seamlessly with PayPal, Stripe, Mollie, RazorPay, and Paystack integration.
  • CRM Integration: Streamline your sales and customer relationship management with Pipedrive, Salesforce, Insightly, and more.
  • Communication Tools: Keep your team informed and improve collaboration with Discord, Slack, Telegram, and Twilio integrations.
  • Email Marketing: Manage your email subscribers and campaigns effortlessly with Mailjet, Mailster, MailPoet, GetGist, and ConvertKit integrations.
  • Data Management: Organize and collaborate on your data efficiently with Airtable, Dropbox, Notion, and Ninja Tables integrations.
  • Customer Support: Enhance customer support efforts with FormGlut Support integration.
  • Social Media: Boost your marketing efforts with WP Social Ninja and BuddyBoss integrations.
  • Booking & Appointment: Enable users to book appointments directly through your forms with FormgBooking integration.

One-Click Migrator

Already using a different form plugin? If you are looking to move to FormGlut, but already using Contact Form 7, WPForms, Caldera Forms, Ninja Forms or Gravity Forms; One-Click Migrator of FormGlut will make the move smooth for you.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/formglut directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the FormGlut -> Settings screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
Do I need coding skill to use FormGlut?

No, You don’t need any pre-requisite programming knowledge to build beautiful forms. With Powerful drag and drop features you can build any simple or complex form.

Will FormGlut slow down my website?

Absolutely not. We build FormGlut very carefully and maintained WP standards as well as we only load styles / scripts in the pages where you will use the FormGlut. FormGlut is faster than any form builder plugin. FormGlut only load less than 30KB css and js combined.

Can I use conditional logics when building a form?

Yes, With our powerful conditional logic panel you can build any type of complex forms. You can add one or multiple conditional logics to any field and it will work like a charm.

Can I build multi-column forms?

Yes, You can use 2 column or 3 column containers and you can build forms.

Can I export the form submission data?

Yes, You can export your data in CSV, Excel, ODS, JSON format.

short_description: User friendly, Lightweight, Most Advanced, Drag & Drop form builder to create your WordPress Forms

upgrade_notice: The latest Version is compatible with previous version, So nothing to worry
